title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III - Policy and Certificate Provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III - Policy and Certificate Provisions

State Regulations

Subchapter A - Life, Accident and Health Insurance (Part 38 to 59)

Subchapter B - Property and Casualty Insurance (Part 60 to 76)
[FN1] See Part 125 for policy provisions relating to reinsurance; for those relating to credit insurance, see Part 185. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Subchapter A - Life, Accident and Health Insurance (Part 38 to 59)

Subchapter B - Property and Casualty Insurance (Part 60 to 76)
[FN1] See Part 125 for policy provisions relating to reinsurance; for those relating to credit insurance, see Part 185. Notes
